reviews.review_content:
Best professor ever! You just have to make sure you don't take your midterm lightly it's a very challenging test also strt the paper a bit early and make sure you ask dr wind any questions you have. He's very approachable and a plain cool guy. A lot of material is taught but it's not hard the homeworks won't prepare you for the midterm!! your going to have to keep on top of the material but make no mistake this is a great course
Workload:
A lot of material is taught but it's not hard the homeworks won't prepare you for the midterm!! your going to have to keep on top of the material but make no mistake this is a great course

Course is very informative and up to date on industry standards of manufacturing research at the nanoscale.  Mostly qualitative content with some quantitative formulas to describe phenomena.  
Wind is a great teacher and from his stories a respected professional.  He gives fair exams, but makes you learn a LOT to do well on them. 
Workload:
Easy-Fair for 6000 level since more qualitative than quantitative
